Place the cards around in a ring upside down. Players will go in a circle drawing a card and have to fulfill a task depending on what card it is. 
Ace - Going around the circle, each player starts drinking their drink consecutively and has to continue drinking until the player before stops. 
2 - The player that draws this card points to someone to take a drink 
3 - The player that draws this card takes a drink 
4 - All the females have to take a drink 
5 - The person that draws this card has to put their hand down on the table and the last to do so drinks 
6 - All the males have to take a drink 
7 - Similar to the rule for drawing a 5 but instead you have to point your hand up in the sky 
8 - Choose a friend to be your 'mate' and everytime one drinks the other drinks 
9 - The player that draws the card chooses a word to rhyme and everyone goes around in a circle saying words that rhyme, if you fail you have to drink 
10 - Similar to the rule for drawing a 9 but instead you choose a category and someone has to name something within that category 
J - The player that draws this card makes a rule that everyone has to follow, if they fail they must drink 
Q - Ask another player a question and if they must answer with another question, if they don't they have to drink 
K - Fill up the center cup with your drink, whoever draws the 4th king must drink the cup in the middle
